channel.title: [PI] Client Finding Mapconfig.txt error please help
channel.description:
Hello, I've been having this problem.
the client runs perfectly and finds the mapconfig.txt (when i download one provided from source dl)
However, if i change the autocachedl link to my dropbox link.
it throws this error. (After downloading the cache and unzipping it partially ). when i compiled my cache i compiled it with the file mapConfig.txt in the maps folder, where the client is looking.
Please help fix this problem, it's like the one thing stopping the client.
Here's my client.java [url=http://up.ht/IaMW48]http://up.ht/IaMW48 [/url]
Here is a photo m8's -
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ikcbyh.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@Be_My_Friend wrote:

Ik its old post but i dont have the “mapConfig.txt” at V8 cache where should i download it to input it on my cache ?

mapconfig is in the wrong folder? or you dont have one? maybe it has the wrong name?

make sure mapconfig.txt is in: insidiax.cache\maps\mapconfig.txt {here
